items.sentence: You're delusional if you really believe that.
The recent earthquake devastated the country.
Tom wiped his greasy fingers on his trousers.
Whoever did that to Tom needs to be punished.
I wonder how much Tom knows about the matter.
You've got to keep the skis exactly parallel.
Some animals can sense the coming of a storm.
I'm not the one responsible for this mistake.
Cuban cigars are among the best in the world.
Why does it feel like we've done this before?
It would be wise to not to underestimate Tom.
It would be wise to stay away from Tom today.
It would be wise to wait until Tom gets here.
Can you recognise the person in this picture?
Everyone at school knows that Tom can't swim.
That still doesn't explain why that happened.
Many people walk past our building every day.
I spent the best part of the day in the pool.
Tom told me that he wouldn't help us do that.
Tom told me that he was good at water skiing.
